attributes.action: make it compulsory for all community care workers to get a fuel allowence and maintenance of their cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: not every homecare service gets a fuel allownece in their wages or in hand. we need to get this to help us with the rise in prices on petrol, diesal. this needs to be assessed as we are caring for the elderly community and if we dont have the funds we cant do the job. there is also alot of wear and tear on the cars themselves so this also needs to be looked at.
